titleStmt.title: The lavvfulnes of hearing the publick ministers of the Church of England proved, by Mr. Philip Nye and Mr. John Robinson, two eminent Congregational divines. Together with the judgment of Dr. Goodwin, Dr. Owen, and other independents, as well ancient as modern, concerning forms of prayer, parish-churches, and communion with them: and the judgment of other nonconformists about kneeling at the sacrament.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.
Robinson, John, 1575?-1625.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
